name: 杰克·索博勒夫斯基
name_full: 杰克·索博勒夫斯基 Jack Sobolewski
introduction: Jack Sobolewski is a fourteen year-old actor based in New York. He is known for his portrayal of Christopher S in Theater Camp written by Ben Platt and Noah Galvin and directed by Molly Gordon and Nick Lieberman. Theater Camp made its premiere in January 2023 at Sundance Film Festival and is set to make an upcoming theatrical release in July! Jack was also part of the national touring company of Elf on the Shelf: A Christmas Musical during the winter of 2021 and performed on iconic stages such as The Fox Theater (Atlanta, GA) and The Boch Center Wang Theater. When not performing Jack spends his time writing and attending Broadway shows whenever he can!!
